title: Venge.io
description: A fast-paced multiplayer first-person shooter with stunning 3D graphics built on PlayCanvas. Features multiple game modes, character classes, and weapons with unique abilities. Known for its smooth performance and competitive gameplay in a browser-based environment.
how_to_play: Use WASD to move, Space to jump, and Shift to sprint. Mouse to aim and left-click to shoot, right-click for scope/aim. Press R to reload and Q for special abilities. On mobile, use the virtual joystick and on-screen buttons. Choose different weapons and classes to match your playstyle.
